document_data.name: Bondari
document_data.mainbody: '''Bondari''', also known as '''Bondari Quickhand''' or '''Bondari Halfman''', was a novice [[adventurer]] and [[thief]].
document_data.Possessions: The adventurer owned a standard set of [[leather armor]] and a [[shortsword]].
document_data.History: Bondari first lived in a peaceful village in the [[Dalelands|Dales]]. He decided to leave to seek fame and fortune, and met his fellow adventurers, [[Nanoc]] and [[Tim Goldenhand]] in a [[tavern]]. From there, they foolishly decided to enter the [[Underdark]], and he encountered the mad wizard [[Iycanth]]'s creations. The creatures quickly petrified the trio, turning them to stone.
document_data.Rumors: His companions mocked him for not being able to ''backstab'' a floating eyeball.
